name: booking_bulk_search
description: Search multiple destinations on Booking.com in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling booking_search multiple times - it is faster and more efficient. Pass all destinations as a single comma-separated string. Example: 'Paris,London,Tokyo'.

detailSteps.code: const results = []; const cards = document.querySelectorAll('[data-testid="property-card"], .sr_property_block'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(cards.length, 5); i++) { const el = cards[i]; const nameEl = el.querySelector('[data-testid="title"], .sr-hotel__name, a[data-testid="title-link"] div'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[data-testid="title-link"], a.hotel_name_link'); const priceEl = el.querySelector('[data-testid="price-and-discounted-price"], .bui-price-display__value, .prco-valign-middle-helper'); const ratingEl = el.querySelector('[data-testid="review-score"] div:first-child, .bui-review-score__badge'); const ratingTextEl = el.querySelector('[data-testid="review-score"] div:nth-child(2) div:first-child, .bui-review-score__text'); const locationEl = el.querySelector('[data-testid="address"], .sr_card_address_line, span[data-testid="distance"]'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('img[data-testid="image"], img.hotel_image'); const url = linkEl ? (linkEl.href.startsWith('http') ? linkEl.href : 'https://www.booking.com' + linkEl.getAttribute('href')) : ''; const name = nameEl ? nameEl.textContent.trim() : ''; if (name) { results.push({ name: name, price: priceEl ? priceEl.textContent.trim() : '', rating_score: ratingEl ? ratingEl.textContent.trim() : '', rating_text: ratingTextEl ? ratingTextEl.textContent.trim() : '', location: locationEl ? locationEl.textContent.trim() : '', image: imgEl ? imgEl.getAttribute('src') : '', url: url }); } } const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { destination: params.get('ss') || '', result_count: results.length, results: results }
